channel.title: Error connecting to server/ server is offline
channel.description: i have been working for the past three days trying to get my server online for others to join. i have port fowarded, i have set all my client.java, gui.gava. i can connect but when it comes to someone else they continue to get the error server is offline, or error connecting to server. i dont know what im doing wrong or what i'm missing. so if i could please get some advice/help it would be greatly appreciated. i have Team Viewer, and also my msn is brendonpenwell@hotmail.com
